1319440.name: Project Midgard
1319440.description:
As part of a security force for a para-military research group, "Project Midgard", life had been pretty easy. Just sit back, watch the scientists do their work, and get paid. Well, that was before they actually succeeded at opening a gate to hell, or connecting a portal to an alien planet, or whatever the hell it is they did. To top it all off, they locked up the bunker with you outside! Now it's up to you (and your friends) to build, upgrade, and explore to hold and defend the bunker for your ticket in.

Features
  • Play single player, or with up to 3 other friends!
  • Fight off increasing waves of enemies.
  • Between waves, go out to explore for resources and items.
  • Build and upgrade defenses for your base.
  • Find and repair old defensive systems.
  • Discover the story and hidden agenda and purpose of Project Midgard.
  • Explore and find interesting locations.
  • Complete quests for favor to buy supplies at the shop.
1319440.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
